form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023, Budget Bureau No. 47-R121

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023 Budget Bureau No. 47-R121 DEPARTMENT OF STATE Approval Expires Dec. 31, 1956 WASHINGTON, D. C. RANCE BY AN INDIVIDUAL SPONSOR FOR NAMED ALIEN (For use under the Refugee Relief Act of 19531 DO NOT WRITE IN THIS SPACE Read Instructions On Page 4 Before Filling In Form I, (ARTHUR) YIN TOY NG NAME: (First) (Middle) (Last) residing at 153 Schreiner Place, San Antonio, Bexar County, Texas (ADDRESS: Street and No., or R.F.D. No., City, County, State) sponsor the admission into the United States under the Refugee Relief Act of 1953 of: (1) Hong Kong Ref.No. 117624 - TAK CHEONG LEE NAME: (First) (Middle) (Last) HOY SUN DISTRICT Feb. 24, 1907 CANTON, CHINA CHINESE (Date of Birth) (Place and Country of Birth) (Nationality) Address 2nd Floor - 90 BONHAM STRAND E. (Camp, or Street and No., City, Province, Country) AMERICAN CONSULATE GENERAL - HONG KONG (Location of American Consulate at which visa application will be made) (2) Members of the family of alien listed under (1) who will accompany him: (Name) (Date of Birth) (Place and Country (Nationality) (Relationship of Birth) to (1)) (a) NONE VERIFIED under the Refugee Relief Act of 1953. (b) 3207 No. (c) JUL 6 - 1954 Date (d) For the Administrator: (e) (3) State your relationship, if any, to any of the aliens listed above PERSONAL FRIEND Director, Visa Office (4) I assure that the alien listed under (1) will be suitably employed as stated below without dis- placing some other person from employment and that such alien and the members of his family as listed above will not become public charges and will have housing without displacing some other person from such housing. I understand that the assurance herewith given by me is my personal obligation, as provided in the Refugee Relief Act of 1953. (a) I assure that the alien listed under (1) will be employed as ASSISTANT MANAGER TRAINEE at (Occupation or Name of Job) Great China Market, 2220 Nogalitos, San Antonio, Texas by (Address of Place of Employment) (Arthur) Yin Toy Ng - 153 Schreiner Place, San Antonio, Texas (Name and Address of Employer) and that such employment will be furnished under the following terms and conditions: (including wages, any other compensations, hours, and other terms) $160.00 per month to start, will increase wages after six (6) months to $175.00 per month - Workman's Compensation Insurance (b) I further assure that such employment is of permanent indefinite nature and will be available upon the arrival of the alien in the United States if such arrival takes place not later than Whenever he gets here (Month, Day and Year)
